entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Stirling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -0.9°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming west 20 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
